task.title: Upload test cases to qTest
task.shortdesc: Katalon allows you to upload a test case or all test cases in a test case folder to qTest.

li.p: The test case or the test case folder you wish to upload must locate in the integrated test case folder with qTest. To learn more about integrating a test case folder with qTest, refer to step 4 in manual setup. See above: Set up qTest integration manually.

steps.stepsection: Upload a test case to qTest

step.cmd: To upload a test case to qTest, in the Tests Explorer panel, right-click on the test case to trigger its context menu. Select qTest > Upload.

image.alt: Upload a Studio test case to qTest

step.cmd: Alternatively, you can also navigate to the Integration tab of the test case. Click Upload.

image.alt: Upload a Studio test case to qTest via the Integration tab

steps.stepsection: Upload a test case folder to qTest

step.cmd: To upload a test case folder to qTest, in the Tests Explorer panel, right-click on the test case folder to trigger its context menu. Select qTest > Upload.

image.alt: Upload a Studio test case folder to qTest

taskbody.result:
Once uploaded successfully, test cases have a qTest icon at the bottom right of the icon as shown below:
qTest icon at the uploaded test cases
Click Navigate to go to qTest to verify whether the test case is successfully uploaded to the integrated qTest module.
Verify upload test cases in qTest
You can also see the following information in the Integration tab of the integrated test case.
Integration information in uploaded test case
FieldDescription
Test Case IDThe ID of the integrated qTest test case.
AliasThe alias of the integrated qTest test case.
Parent IDThe ID of the integrated qTest module.
VersionThe qTest test case version.
